SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.progression.wallet

Class Wallet

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.progression.wallet.Wallet
public class Wallet extends Object
The Wallet class enables a player to collect, store and spend coins and skills points which allow purchase of Shop Items and unlocking of Skills to use in-level. A Wallet is created within and assigned to a Profile. A Wallet can be created with preset or variable coins and skillsPoints.

    • purchaseShopItem

      public boolean purchaseShopItem(int itemCost)
      Purchases Shop Item where Wallet has sufficient coins, and returns true, otherwise returns false
      Parameters:
      itemCost - the cost of the item to purchase
      Returns:
      true if the item was purchased successfully, false otherwise
